response.overview: This is a fan rewrite film of the Five Nights at Freddy’s movie. As this is a fan film, I will profit no money off of this project.  Mike Schmidt is a man haunted by his horrific past, stricken by memories of a man in a yellow rabbit costume who took his younger brother years prior whilst grappling with the reality of watching over his adorable 10 year old sister, Abby, for the summer. Unfortunately, the past never lets go and Mike's search for personal redemption and answers leads him to the core of his dreams: Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, a long abandoned pizza place lost to time. As Mike starts a security job there, he starts to notice that nothing at Freddy's is all it seems and, soon enough, Mike discovers a horrible secret about the restaurant's past that will force him into a dangerous game of survival and throw him into the heart of his worst nightmare come true.
response.tagline: It’s Time to Clock In, Employee…
response.title: Five Nights at Freddy’s REWIRED
